mapper.select: SELECT article.article_id, article.title, article.view_count, article.is_pinned, article.created_datetime, cms__image.original_url FROM cms__article article LEFT OUTER JOIN cms__image ON article.article_id = (SELECT cms__image.image_id FROM cms__image WHERE article.article_id = cms__image.image_id ORDER BY cms__image.created_datetime LIMIT 1) WHERE article.board_id = #{boardId}

mapper.select: SELECT cms__article.article_id, cms__article.board_id, cms__article.created_datetime, cms__article.is_pinned, cms__article.view_count, cms__article.title, cms__article.content_html, cms__article.content_string, cms__board.name_ko FROM cms__article INNER JOIN cms__board ON cms__article.board_id = cms__board.board_id WHERE cms__article.article_id = #{articleId}

SELECT article.article_id, article.title, article.view_count, article.is_pinned, article.created_datetime, cms__image.original_url FROM cms__article article LEFT OUTER JOIN cms__image ON article.article_id = (SELECT cms__image.image_id FROM cms__image WHERE article.article_id = cms__image.image_id ORDER BY cms__image.created_datetime LIMIT 1) WHERE article.board_id IN (SELECT cms__board.board_id FROM cms__board WHERE cms__board.name_ko LIKE CONCAT('%' , #{boardName} , '%'))

SELECT article.article_id, article.title, article.view_count, article.is_pinned, article.created_datetime, cms__image.original_url FROM cms__article article LEFT OUTER JOIN cms__image ON article.article_id = (SELECT cms__image.image_id FROM cms__image WHERE article.article_id = cms__image.image_id ORDER BY cms__image.created_datetime LIMIT 1) WHERE article.title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{boardName}, '%') OR article.content_string LIKE CONCAT('%', #{boardName}, '%')

SELECT article.article_id, article.title, article.view_count, article.is_pinned, article.created_datetime, cms__image.original_url FROM cms__article article LEFT OUTER JOIN cms__image ON article.article_id = (SELECT cms__image.image_id FROM cms__image WHERE article.article_id = cms__image.image_id ORDER BY cms__image.created_datetime LIMIT 1) WHERE DATE(article.created_datetime) BETWEEN STR_TO_DATE(#{from}, '%Y-%m-%d') AND STR_TO_DATE(#{until}, '%Y-%m-%d')
